RESOURCE.INFO: SELECT VIEW_AR_HQI.INSTITUT,VIEW_AR_HQI.CODE,VIEW_AR_HQI.VERSION,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEATURE_NAME,VIEW_AR_HQI.TARGET_NAME,VIEW_AR_HQI.TARGET_CLASS,VIEW_AR_HQI.ENC_MET,VIEW_AR_HQI.PERSON,VIEW_AR_HQI.CONTACT,VIEW_AR_HQI.REFERENCE,VIEW_AR_HQI.OBSERVAT,VIEW_AR_HQI.INSTRUME,VIEW_AR_HQI.TELESCOP,VIEW_AR_HQI.OBSINST_KEY,VIEW_AR_HQI.UNITS,VIEW_AR_HQI.WAVEMIN,VIEW_AR_HQI.WAVEMAX,VIEW_AR_HQI.WAVENAME,VIEW_AR_HQI.WAVEUNIT,VIEW_AR_HQI.SPECTRAL_DOMAIN,VIEW_AR_HQI.OBS_TYPE,VIEW_AR_HQI.OBS_CAT,VIEW_AR_HQI.DATE_OBS,VIEW_AR_HQI.DATE_END,VIEW_AR_HQI.JDINT,VIEW_AR_HQI.JDFRAC,VIEW_AR_HQI.C_ROTATION,VIEW_AR_HQI.FILENAME,VIEW_AR_HQI.URL,VIEW_AR_HQI.CDELT1,VIEW_AR_HQI.CDELT2,VIEW_AR_HQI.NAXIS1,VIEW_AR_HQI.NAXIS2,VIEW_AR_HQI.CENTER_X,VIEW_AR_HQI.CENTER_Y,VIEW_AR_HQI.R_SUN,VIEW_AR_HQI.BITPIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.BSCALE,VIEW_AR_HQI.BZERO,VIEW_AR_HQI.EXP_TIME,VIEW_AR_HQI.FILE_FORMAT,VIEW_AR_HQI.FILE_SIZE,VIEW_AR_HQI.PROCESSING_LVL,VIEW_AR_HQI.DATA_TYPE,VIEW_AR_HQI.QCLK_URL,VIEW_AR_HQI.QCLK_FNAME,VIEW_AR_HQI.ID_AR,VIEW_AR_HQI.NOAA_NUMBER,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_X_PIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_Y_PIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_X_ARCSEC,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_Y_ARCSEC,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_HG_LONG_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_HG_LAT_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_CARR_LONG_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_CARR_LAT_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_X0_PIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_Y0_PIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_X1_PIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_Y1_PIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_X2_PIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_Y2_PIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_X3_PIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_Y3_PIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_X0_ARCSEC,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_Y0_ARCSEC,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_X1_ARCSEC,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_Y1_ARCSEC,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_X2_ARCSEC,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_Y2_ARCSEC,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_X3_ARCSEC,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_Y3_ARCSEC,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_HG_LONG0_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_HG_LAT0_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_HG_LONG1_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_HG_LAT1_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_HG_LONG2_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_HG_LAT2_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_HG_LONG3_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_HG_LAT3_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_CARR_LONG0_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_CARR_LAT0_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_CARR_LONG1_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_CARR_LAT1_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_CARR_LONG2_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_CARR_LAT2_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_CARR_LONG3_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.BR_CARR_LAT3_DEG,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_AREA_PIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_AREA_DEG2,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_AREA_MM2,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_MAX_INT,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_MIN_INT,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_MEAN_INT,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_MEAN2QSUN,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_MIN_BZ,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_MAX_BZ,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_MEAN_BZ,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_MEAN_GRAD,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_MEDIAN_GRAD,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_MAX_GRAD,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_LENGTH_NL,VIEW_AR_HQI.FEAT_LENGTH_SG,VIEW_AR_HQI.CC_X_PIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.CC_Y_PIX,VIEW_AR_HQI.CC_X_ARCSEC,VIEW_AR_HQI.CC_Y_ARCSEC,VIEW_AR_HQI.CC,VIEW_AR_HQI.CC_LENGTH,VIEW_AR_HQI.SNAPSHOT,VIEW_AR_HQI.TRACK_ID,VIEW_AR_HQI.PHENOM,VIEW_AR_HQI.REF_FEAT,VIEW_AR_HQI.TRACK_LVL_TRUST FROM VIEW_AR_HQI WHERE (date_obs>='2010-01-01T00:03:02' and date_obs<='2010-01-01T04:03:02') AND ( OBSERVAT='SOHO' ) AND ( INSTRUME='MDI' ) LIMIT 100000

FIELD.name: INSTITUT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Institute responsible for running the FR code

FIELD.name: CODE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the FR code

FIELD.name: VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version of the FR code

FIELD.name: FEATURE_NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Features detected

FIELD.name: TARGET_NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Standard name of target

FIELD.name: TARGET_CLASS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Type of target

FIELD.name: ENC_MET
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Encoding method (raster, chain code, none...)

FIELD.name: PERSON
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Person responsible for running the FR code

FIELD.name: CONTACT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Contact of the person responsible for running the FR code

FIELD.name: REFERENCE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Any reference to a document or article that describes the fr code

FIELD.name: OBSERVAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the observatory/spacecraft

FIELD.name: INSTRUME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the instrument

FIELD.name: TELESCOP
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the sub-part (telescope/receiver)

FIELD.name: OBSINST_KEY
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: HELIO ICS keyword of the observatory-instrument

FIELD.name: UNITS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Intensity units on the original observation

FIELD.name: WAVEMIN
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Minimum wavelength of the observation

FIELD.name: WAVEMAX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Maximum wavelength of the observation

FIELD.name: WAVENAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the wavelength of the observation

FIELD.name: WAVEUNIT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Units of the wavelength of the observation

FIELD.name: SPECTRAL_DOMAIN
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Spectral domain covered by the observation

FIELD.name: OBS_TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Type of observations (i.e., REMOTE-SENSING, IN-SITU, or BOTH)

FIELD.name: OBS_CAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Category of observatory (i.e, SPACEBORNE, GROUND-BASED, or BOTH)

FIELD.name: DATE_OBS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Start date of the observation

FIELD.name: DATE_END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: End date of the observation

FIELD.name: JDINT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Julian day of the observation, integer part

FIELD.name: JDFRAC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Julian day of the observation, fraction part

FIELD.name: C_ROTATION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Carrington rotation

FIELD.name: FILENAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the original file

FIELD.name: URL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: URL of the original file

FIELD.name: CDELT1
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Scale of the original observation along X axis

FIELD.name: CDELT2
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Scale of the original observation along Y axis

FIELD.name: NAXIS1
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: First dimension of the original image (X)

FIELD.name: NAXIS2
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Second dimension of the original image (Y)

FIELD.name: CENTER_X
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Reference pixel coordinate along X axis

FIELD.name: CENTER_Y
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Reference pixel coordinate along Y axis

FIELD.name: R_SUN
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Radius of the Sun in pixels

FIELD.name: BITPIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Coding of the original image

FIELD.name: BSCALE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Coefficient of the scaling equation: physical_values = BZERO + BSCALE x array_values

FIELD.name: BZERO
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Offset value of the scaling equation: physical_values = BZERO + BSCALE x array_values

FIELD.name: EXP_TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Exposure time (if available), in seconds and fraction of s

FIELD.name: FILE_FORMAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Format of the data file (e.g., FITS, CDF, BINARY, etc.)

FIELD.name: FILE_SIZE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Size of the data file in kilobytes

FIELD.name: PROCESSING_LVL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Data processing level following the CODMAC conventions

FIELD.name: DATA_TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Type of data (e.g., IMAGE, DYNAMIC SPECTRUM, TIME_SERIES, etc.)

FIELD.name: QCLK_URL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: URL of the quicklook image directory

FIELD.name: QCLK_FNAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the quicklook image file

FIELD.name: NOAA_NUMBER
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: NOAA region number

FIELD.name: FEAT_X_PIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: X image coordinates of the feature gravity centre in pixel

FIELD.name: FEAT_Y_PIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Y image coordinates of the AR gravity centre in pixels

FIELD.name: FEAT_X_ARCSEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: X Heliocentric coordinates of the AR gravity centre in arcsec

FIELD.name: FEAT_Y_ARCSEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Y Heliocentric coordinates of the AR gravity centre in arcsec

FIELD.name: FEAT_HG_LONG_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Heliographic longitude of the AR gravity centre in degrees

FIELD.name: FEAT_HG_LAT_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Heliographic latitude of the AR gravity centre in degrees

FIELD.name: FEAT_CARR_LONG_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Carrington longitude of the AR gravity centre in degrees

FIELD.name: FEAT_CARR_LAT_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Carrington latitude of the AR gravity centre in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_X0_PIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate South East most point in pixels

FIELD.name: BR_Y0_PIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate South East most point in pixels

FIELD.name: BR_X1_PIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate North East most point in pixels

FIELD.name: BR_Y1_PIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate North East most point in pixels

FIELD.name: BR_X2_PIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate South West most point in pixels

FIELD.name: BR_Y2_PIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate South West most point in pixels

FIELD.name: BR_X3_PIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate North West most point in pixels

FIELD.name: BR_Y3_PIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate North West most point in pixels

FIELD.name: BR_X0_ARCSEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate South East most point in arcsec

FIELD.name: BR_Y0_ARCSEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate South East most point in arcsec

FIELD.name: BR_X1_ARCSEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate North East most point in arcsec

FIELD.name: BR_Y1_ARCSEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate North East most point in arcsec

FIELD.name: BR_X2_ARCSEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate South West most point in arcsec

FIELD.name: BR_Y2_ARCSEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate South West most point in arcsec

FIELD.name: BR_X3_ARCSEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate North West most point in arcsec

FIELD.name: BR_Y3_ARCSEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliocentric coordinate North West most point in arcsec

FIELD.name: BR_HG_LONG0_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliographic coordinate South East most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_HG_LAT0_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliographic coordinate South East most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_HG_LONG1_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliographic coordinate North East most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_HG_LAT1_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliographic coordinate North East most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_HG_LONG2_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliographic coordinate South West most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_HG_LAT2_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliographic coordinate South West most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_HG_LONG3_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliographic coordinate North West most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_HG_LAT3_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle heliographic coordinate North West most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_CARR_LONG0_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle Carrington coordinate South East most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_CARR_LAT0_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle Carrington coordinate South East most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_CARR_LONG1_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle Carrington coordinate North East most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_CARR_LAT1_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle Carrington coordinate North East most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_CARR_LONG2_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle Carrington coordinate South West most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_CARR_LAT2_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle Carrington coordinate South West most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_CARR_LONG3_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle Carrington coordinate North West most point in degrees

FIELD.name: BR_CARR_LAT3_DEG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Bounding rectangle Carrington coordinate North West most point in degrees

FIELD.name: FEAT_AREA_PIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of pixels included in the feature

FIELD.name: FEAT_AREA_DEG2
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Area of the feature in square degrees

FIELD.name: FEAT_AREA_MM2
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Area in Mm2 of the AR

FIELD.name: FEAT_MAX_INT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: AR max. intensity value, in units of the original observation

FIELD.name: FEAT_MIN_INT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: AR min. intensity value, in units of the original observation

FIELD.name: FEAT_MEAN_INT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: AR mean intensity value in the units of the original observation

FIELD.name: FEAT_MEAN2QSUN
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Mean of the AR to QS instensity ratio

FIELD.name: FEAT_MIN_BZ
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: AR min. line-of-sight magnetic field value, in Gauss

FIELD.name: FEAT_MAX_BZ
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: AR max. line-of-sight magnetic field value, in Gauss

FIELD.name: FEAT_MEAN_BZ
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: AR mean line-of-sight magnetic field value in Gauss

FIELD.name: FEAT_MEAN_GRAD
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Mean of the horizontal gradient polarity separation line (G/Mm)

FIELD.name: FEAT_MEDIAN_GRAD
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Median of the horizontal gradient polarity separation line (G/Mm)

FIELD.name: FEAT_MAX_GRAD
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Maximum of the horizontal gradient polarity separation line (G/Mm)

FIELD.name: FEAT_LENGTH_NL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: AR length of the neutral line in Mm

FIELD.name: FEAT_LENGTH_SG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: AR length of the strong gradient of nl above 50G/Mm

FIELD.name: CC_X_PIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: X coordinate of chain code start position in pixels

FIELD.name: CC_Y_PIX
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Y coordinate of chain code start position in pixels

FIELD.name: CC_X_ARCSEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: X coordinate of chain code start position in arcsec

FIELD.name: CC_Y_ARCSEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Y coordinate of chain code start position in arcsec

FIELD.name: CC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Boundary chain code

FIELD.name: CC_LENGTH
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Length of the chain code

FIELD.name: TRACK_ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Index of the feature during a rotation

FIELD.name: PHENOM
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number referring to the behaviour of the feature

FIELD.name: REF_FEAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Feature on which the phenomen applies

FIELD.name: TRACK_LVL_TRUST
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Percentage of confidence of the tracking
